title: rAmanai bhajittAl
sahitya:
rAmanai bhajittAl nOivinai tIrum vIN sancalam aghanriDumE sItA


anupallavi

  rAmanaik-kaNNAl kANbOm inrE pirandha payan aDaivOm


caraNam    tunba mODinbam kalandadu prapancam veyililaiyEl nizhalil inbamum uNDO
tuyarilaiyEl aiyanai ninaippAruNDO shOdanait-tIyil puDamiDuvAn irangi
tUkki edut-tAnandam aLittiDuvAn avan nAmAmrutam piNikku divyauSadam jaya
rAm rAm rAm sItA rm rAm rAm enE
